Html:
Is it possible to emulate the Test mode / Exam mode?

On the TI-84 device one can enter into the Test mode menu by switching ON the device while keeping the left- and right-cursor keys pressed.

Is there a way to obtain this behavior as well with the emulator?
Or is there another (hacky) way to have the emulator enter into the Test mode menu?

I need to take screen shots for an Final Exams guide book.

Stephan

Let me reply my own question with my own answer.
The matter is in fact quite simple.
  • Start the TI-84 Emulator
  • Make sure it is switched off (2nd - Off)
  • Press and hold the left- and right- cursor keys on the PC keyboard
  • And click "On" on the TI-84 emulator
  • Lo and behold: The Test Mode Menu appears
Easy as Apple pie.
